basic.Peptide Name: Melittin (Allergen Api m 3; Allergen Api m III; Insects, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.29783753] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC=2 μM), Listeria monocytogenes CMCC 54004 (MIC=1 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1 μM), Escherichia coli UB 1005 (MIC=2 μM), Salmonella pullorum C7913 (MIC=8 μM), Salmonella enterica subsp enterica CMCC 50071 (MIC=2 μM)
